title: Motorama V1.1 with crack
description:
OVERVIEW

Motorama, is a realistic motocross simulation game. Ride through tons of challenging tracks on multiple different bikes. Post your high scores online and compete worldwide for the title of Motorama Champion. Use realistic bike physics as you jump buses. Adjust body position to maneuver the bike to counter torque produced by the rear wheel, as well as land jumps. Unlike racing simulations, Motorama is almost like a puzzle game, where deciding where you give it the gas and how to position your landing creates the best strategy to reach the finish line in the fastest time possible.Version 1.1 adds new map editor along with the documentation/tutorial, improves physics model to prevent some glitches

Basically its a really fun motorbiking game!

Psdcon
